title: Church of the Gromp

embed.description: Hello, I am G4m3r25 from Oceania, and I am one of the many messengers of the Gromp. I am here to promote the Church of our Great Lord the Gromp, and we are all only messengers, as nobody is any higher than this in the Gromp's eyes.

body:
Hello, my many fellow messengers and followers. It is I, G4m3r25, one of the co-founders of the Church of the Gromp, and this is our message from the Gromp.

"Hello, I am the great Gromp and I hope all is well for you all. Those of you who are in need of guidance, here is my message today; if you sacrifice yourself to me, you will be greatly rewarded for your actions. May my holy grace and power be with you in all your future battles.  The link to our philosophy is above."

Thank you for taking the time to read the great Gromp's message.

-G4m3r25, co-founder of the Church of the Gromp, along with Nuggie11

replies.body: Didn't I already tell you on your last post, that gromp is but a mere minions compared to the sand that swallows us whole.
Hush, Acolyte of Shurima, your "god" Azir, has pitiful winrate of 44.6%
Compared to gromps 100% death rate. XD
You know what? Despite our religions, we might just get along XD
If only the world could follow our lead.

Can if you wish.
Im usually busy doing acolyte things.
...Or smiting gromps when im jungling.
Gromp is saddened by your words XD Wish I could be stuffed getting Gromp icon :(
I have like 200 RP so I couldn't get it either XD

> [{quoted}](name=Akivir,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=40IqAzYk,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-06-22T12:00:22.276+0000)
>
> I'll stick with Cthulu

Terraria Confirmed
Feel free to send us friend requests. We shall unite as Messengers of the Great Lord our Gromp.
